entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
